SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.conductor.kafka.hadoop
Class KafkaJobBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.conductor.kafka.hadoop.KafkaJobBuilder

@Beta
public final class KafkaJobBuilder
extends Object

KafkaJobBuilder is an attempt to make Map/Reduce jobs over Kafka queues easier to configure.

Usage of this class:

  1. Create a new builder using newBuilder().
  2. Set the job configurations on the builder instance.
  3. Create any number of Job instances by calling configureJob(Configuration).
  4. Any additional job setup can be set on the resulting Job instance.

The following are required settings:

  1. The Zookeeper connection string: setZkConnect(String)
  2. At least one queue input: addQueueInput(String, String, Class)
  3. One output format: setNullOutputFormat(), setTextFileOutputFormat(), or setSequenceFileOutputFormat(). If the output path is not specified, one will be generated for you.
  4. If your output path is S3, you must also specify your S3 credentials using useS3(String, String, String) , where defaultS3Bucket is optional if and only if you have specified the full path of your output. Otherwise, defaultS3Bucket will be used to generate an output path.

Note that calling configureJob(Configuration) has no side effects on the instance of the KafkaJobBuilder, so it is more like a "builder factory" in that sense; you can call configureJob(Configuration) as many times as you want, changing job parameters in between calls if you so choose.

Author:
Casey Green
See Also:
KafkaInputFormat, MultipleKafkaInputFormat

Method Detail

configureJob

public Job configureJob(Configuration conf)
                 throws Exception
Creates a Job based on how this KafkaJobBuilder has been configured. There are no side-effects on this instance when you call this method, so you can call it multiple times.

Parameters:
conf - the job conf.
Returns:
a fully configured Job.
Throws:
Exception
IllegalArgumentException - if any required parameters are not set.

setNumReduceTasks

public KafkaJobBuilder setNumReduceTasks(int numReduceTasks)
Sets the number of reduce tasks to use (optional).

You do not need to set this to 0 if you are not using a Reducer - the builder will infer that.

numReduceTasks - number of reduce tasks to use.

setNullOutputFormat

public KafkaJobBuilder setNullOutputFormat()
Job will use NullOutputFormat.

Note that NullWritable is used for output key and value.

Returns:
this

setTextFileOutputFormat

public KafkaJobBuilder setTextFileOutputFormat(@Nullable
                                               String outputPath)
Job will use TextOutputFormat, using the fully specified outputPath if it is not null. Otherwise the job will generate an output path as specified by setTextFileOutputFormat().

Note that Text is used for output key and value.

Parameters:
outputPath - (optional) the fully specified output path of the job.
Returns:
this

setTextFileOutputFormat

public KafkaJobBuilder setTextFileOutputFormat()
Job will use TextOutputFormat, generating a unique output path either under the user's HDFS home directory, or under getS3Bucket() if useS3(String, String, String) was set.

Note that Text is used for output key and value.

Returns:
this

setSequenceFileOutputFormat

public KafkaJobBuilder setSequenceFileOutputFormat(@Nullable
                                                   String outputPath)
Job will use SequenceFileOutputFormat, using the fully specified outputPath if it is not null. Otherwise the job will generate an output path as specified by setSequenceFileOutputFormat().

Note that BytesWritable is used for output key and value.

Parameters:
outputPath - (optional) the fully specified output path of the job.
Returns:
this

setSequenceFileOutputFormat

public KafkaJobBuilder setSequenceFileOutputFormat()
Job will use SequenceFileOutputFormat, generating a unique output path either under the user's HDFS home directory, or under getS3Bucket() if useS3(String, String, String) was set.

Note that BytesWritable is used for output key and value.

Returns:
this

setUseLazyOutput

public KafkaJobBuilder setUseLazyOutput()
Job will set LazyOutputFormat.setOutputFormatClass(Job, Class).

Returns:
this

useS3

public KafkaJobBuilder useS3(String accessKeyId,
                             String secretKey,
                             @Nullable
                             String defaultBucket)
Indicates that you intend to use S3 as a target for your output.

If you specify setSequenceFileOutputFormat() in addition to this method, an output path will be generated and put into the defaultBucket.

Parameters:
accessKeyId - S3 access key, which requires read/write/delete permissions on the output path.
secretKey - S3 secret key
defaultBucket - the default bucket to use if no path is explicitly specified.
Returns:
this
